product_name: Klean Kanteen Sport Cap 3.0 Bottle Cap
long_description: The Klean Kanteen Sport Cap 3.0 bottle cap has been completely redesigned with a soft silicone spout and a new valve for better leak resistance, a higher flow rate and quieter performance. New design has a 25% higher flow rate than the previous version. Valve won't chirp or whistle while you sip. Cap fits all narrow-mouth Klean Kanteen Classic bottle sizes. Clip an accessory carabiner (sold separately) to the integrated loop to hang your bottle from a backpack strap. Klean Kanteen Sport Cap 3.0 bottle cap is not 100% leakproof, so keep bottle upright when possible. Dishwasher safe.
short_description: The Klean Kanteen Sport Cap 3.0 bottle cap has been completely redesigned with a soft silicone spout and a new valve for better leak resistance, a higher flow rate and quieter performance.
